Package agents

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Collector
    public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates all of the actions in an Agent that moves in the coordinate system, and interacts with other agents there
    Author:
    Felix
